Issue.creator: burdettadam
Issue.summary: Get Indy errors 308 Pool Incompatible Protocol Version
Issue.description: I create two docker. The first, It for indy_pool. The second, It for DAPP. When I create Pool ledger and steward. I got errors 308.I set static IP & Port for both of It, and It can see each other. The DApp run on real machine, It worked fine. But, The DApp has this error when run on docker container.Thank you.
